briefTitle: Effectiveness and Safety of Preoperative Magnetic Detection of Non-palpable Breast Lesions
officialTitle: Effectiveness and Safety of Preoperative Magnetic Detection of Non-palpable Breast Lesions
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient whose age ≥ 18 years
* Patient with non-palpable benign, atypical or cancerous lesions
* Preoperative biopsy
* Requiring surgical excision
* French speaking patient

Exclusion Criteria:

* Palpable breast lesion
* Contraindication to the installation of a magnetic tracer
* Patient under guardianship or curatorship
* Patient deprived of liberty
* Patient under court protection
* Patient opposing the use of his data for this research
